Text: Hi there Cc Hi Mukul Hope you are doing well I am sorry I missed you on my visit to India I know you were pretty tied up with the baby and I should have planned a little better but inevitably it always gets to be a rush Later on the day I was to leave I asked my mom and she told me you had called so not only did I not see you while I was there I managed to not call you back How are things coming along Hows family Hope business is going well Email me when you get a chance Harry Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions buy the things you want at great prices

Long time no talk Cc Hi Vijay Havent spoken to you in the last couple of months I was in India in March for about days I was in Delhi to see my parents right around Holi I tried hard calling you but could not get through your number Unfortunately I did not have your parents home number on me I am hoping next time I could visit you all in Daman What else is going on Hows job Hows Monika and Kartikeye What do you think about these latest market sell offs till the last couple of days I dont know if I gave you the latest on my end In March I moved back from the ecommerce group into the energy trading I am running the options trading for East Power trading It is inherently interesting market The wholesale market is divided into or so hubs where you have good transmission connectivity and it trades for time blocks like each month and further divided into each hour Its the market process extended to one end Hope every one is well in family Write me when you get a chance Harry Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions buy the things you want at great prices

Financial Risk White paper Cc Jay Find enclosed a four page note on the interest rate and foreign exchange hedging process the underlying philosophy methodology issues and system requirements Hopefully this should be helpful to all involved Harry Do You Yahoo Send FREE video emails in Yahoo Mail videomail Financial Risk White Paperdoc
